name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant design perfect for all activities.

name: Minimalist Leather Wallet
description: Handcrafted genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology. Slim design holds up to 8 cards and cash. Available in multiple colors.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft, breathable organic cotton t-shirt with a comfortable fit. Sustainably made and available in various sizes and colors.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-wall insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and leak-proof design.

name: Wireless Phone Charger
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and overcharge protection.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 handcrafted ceramic coffee mugs with unique glazed finish. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for your morning coffee ritual.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Compact portable speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery life, and waterproof design. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Premium Skincare Set
description: Complete skincare routine with cleanser, toner, serum, and moisturizer. Made with natural ingredients for all skin types.

name: Yoga Mat with Carrying Strap
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Includes carrying strap and alignment guides for perfect poses.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch controls, USB charging port, and multiple brightness levels. Perfect for work and study.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with modern fit. Made from premium cotton denim with vintage wash finish. Perfect for layering.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and 50-hour battery life.

name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with color-changing LED lights. Creates a relaxing atmosphere for your home or office.

name: Lip Balm Set
description: Set of 3 natural lip balms with different flavors. Made with organic ingredients to keep your lips soft and moisturized.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with advanced cushioning technology. Breathable mesh upper and durable rubber sole.

name: Cookbook Collection
description: Set of 3 bestselling cookbooks featuring international cuisines. Over 300 recipes with step-by-step instructions.

name: Smartphone Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum smartphone stand compatible with all phone sizes. Perfect for video calls, watching videos, and hands-free use.

name: Silk Scarf
description: Luxurious silk scarf with elegant floral pattern. Soft and lightweight, perfect for adding style to any outfit.

name: Plant Pot Set
description: Set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes and saucers. Perfect for indoor plants and herbs.

name: Face Mask Set
description: Pack of 10 hydrating face masks with natural ingredients. Suitable for all skin types and provides deep moisturization.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Complete resistance bands set with 5 different resistance levels. Includes door anchor, handles, and ankle straps.

name: Mystery Novel Collection
description: Collection of 5 bestselling mystery novels from renowned authors. Perfect for thriller and mystery enthusiasts.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and 24-hour battery life. IPX7 waterproof rating for sports and workouts.

name: Casual Sneakers
description: Comfortable casual sneakers with memory foam insole. Versatile design suitable for everyday wear and light activities.

name: Essential Oil Set
description: Set of 6 pure essential oils including lavender, eucalyptus, peppermint, and more. Perfect for aromatherapy and relaxation.

name: Camping Backpack
description: Durable 50L camping backpack with multiple compartments, rain cover, and ergonomic design. Perfect for hiking and outdoor adventures.

name: Self-Help Book Bundle
description: Bundle of 3 popular self-help books focusing on productivity, mindfulness, and personal growth.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Voice-controlled smart home hub compatible with all major smart devices. Control lights, temperature, and security from anywhere.

name: Leather Handbag
description: Elegant leather handbag with multiple compartments and adjustable strap. Perfect for work and casual occasions.

name: Kitchen Knife Set
description: Professional 8-piece kitchen knife set with wooden block. High-carbon stainless steel blades for precision cutting.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Anti-aging vitamin C serum with hyaluronic acid. Brightens skin and reduces fine lines for a youthful glow.

name: Basketball
description: Official size basketball with superior grip and bounce. Perfect for indoor and outdoor play.

name: Programming Books Set
description: Complete set of 4 programming books covering Python, JavaScript, React, and algorithms. Perfect for developers.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Adjustable tablet stand made from premium aluminum. Compatible with all tablet sizes and perfect for video calls.

name: Winter Coat
description: Warm winter coat with down insulation and water-resistant exterior. Features multiple pockets and removable hood.

name: Decorative Candles Set
description: Set of 6 scented decorative candles with different fragrances. Made from natural soy wax with 40-hour burn time each.

name: Hair Care Set
description: Complete hair care set with shampoo, conditioner, and hair mask. Suitable for all hair types and enriched with natural oils.

name: Tennis Racket
description: Professional tennis racket with graphite frame and comfortable grip. Perfect for intermediate to advanced players.

name: Fiction Novel Collection
description: Collection of 6 award-winning fiction novels from contemporary authors. Perfect for book lovers and literature enthusiasts.
